aptitude.workstations.coal: A steady supply of quality fuel — just what the furnace needs!
aptitude.workstations.sweet_berry_bush: The berries make a great sauce, and the bush itself — an amazing spice.
aptitude.workstations.lodestone: Even the best tools need calibration! Always keep a lodestone at hand.
aptitude.workstations.soul_campfire: The soul fire is a pathway to many abilities some would consider to be unnatural.
aptitude.workstations.bone_block: Fertilizer aplenty! Better not to think too hard about those bones though...
aptitude.workstations.target: Having a test target will definitely help catch flawed designs early!
aptitude.workstations.cobweb: A ready supply of string, just try not to get it on your hands.
aptitude.workstations.candle: Better lighting, and the fire hazard keeps you alert. Win-win!
aptitude.workstations.amethyst_block: Not only do the gems help keep the cutter sharp, they look great in stone too!
aptitude.workstations.beehive: Looking after livestock and after bees at the same time, what could go wrong?
aptitude.workstations.ancient_debris: Just a small bit of this stuff makes the tools stronger! What is it even made of?
aptitude.workstations.anvil: Nothing like a good old anvil to pound a blade into shape.
